Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if modtime == nil then modtime = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if StopRota then StopRota = false PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFF15E615reenabled!") else StopRota = true PQR_WriteToChat("Rotation \124cFFE61515stopped!") end end
if not AOE then function AOE() if AoE == true then return true else return false end end end
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if modtime == nil then modtime = 0 end
if IsRightAltKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - modtime > 0.3 then modtime = GetTime() if AoE then AoE = false PQR_WriteToChat("\124c00FFFC01AOE stoped!") else AoE = true PQR_WriteToChat("\124c00fEBA0EAOE enabled!") end end
if not SOR then function SOR() if SofR == true then return true else return false end end end
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if modtime == nil then modtime = 0 end
if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - modtime > 0.3 then modtime = GetTime() if SofR then SofR = false PQR_WriteToChat("\124c00FFFC01SoCr/SoV active!") else SofR = true PQR_WriteToChat("\124c004E2A04SoR active!") end end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 21892, 40733, 97532, 41451 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy" } local elite = { "Overlord Ror", "Ragepaw", "Liam", "Galleon", "Fire Giant", "Hogger", "Specimen 23" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil local eliteboss = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if immunity or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end
for i,v in ipairs(elite) do if UnitName("target") == v then eliteboss = 1 end end
IsBoss = nil function IsBoss() if UnitExists("target") and ( UnitLevel("target") == -1 or eliteboss ) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Drink") or UnitBuff("player", "Food") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Functions --
Ability.Lua:
if not functionsloaded then
-- Trinket Checker -- UsableTrink = { 450139, -- Living Cauterizing Flames 2019 450138 -- Everburning Shell 2019 }
function IsUsableTrink() for i=1, #UsableTrink do if IsEquippedItem(UsableTrink[i], 13) then return true end end end
-- Glyph Check -- glyph = function(glyphID) local hasglyph = false; local i = 1; local glyph = GetGlyphSocketInfo(i); while glyph do local id = select(3, GetGlyphSocketInfo(i)); if id == glyphID then hasglyph = true; break; end i = i + 1; glyph = GetGlyphSocketInfo(i); end return hasglyph; end
-- Check target -- function CanAttack() if UnitExists("target") and UnitCanAttack("player", "target") == 1 then return true end end
function UnX() if UnitExists("target") then return true end end
-- Check if player move -- function pMove() if GetUnitSpeed("player") >= 3 then return true end end
-- Check if player stay -- function pStay() if GetUnitSpeed("player") == 0 then return true end end
-- Combat Check -- function inCombat() if UnitAffectingCombat("player") ~= nil then return true end end
-- Get HP simple -- function getHp(unit) if UnitExists(unit) ~= nil then return 100 * UnitHealth(unit) / UnitHealthMax(unit) end end
-- Get Mana simple -- function getMana(unit) if UnitExists(unit) ~= nil then return 100 * UnitPower(unit) / UnitPowerMax(unit) end end
-- Calculate HP simple -- function CalculateHP(t) local ActualWithIncoming = 100 * UnitHealth(t) / UnitHealthMax(t) if ActualWithIncoming then return ActualWithIncoming else return 100 end end
-- Spell Cooldown remaining check -- CooldownRemains = nil function CooldownRemains(spellID) local start, duration, enable = GetSpellCooldown(spellID) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Item Cooldown remaining check -- ItemCooldownRemains = nil function ItemCooldownRemains(itemID) local start, duration, enable = GetItemCooldown(itemID) if ( start > 0 and duration > 1.5 ) then return start + duration - GetTime() else return false end end
-- Amount of Cooldown that remains -- function cdRemains(spellid) if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) > 0 then return select(2,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(spellid)) - GetTime()) else return 0 end end
-- Range Check Simple -- function rangeCheck(spellid,unit) if IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid),unit) == 1 then return true end end
-- Threat -- function threat(t) if UnitExists(t) and UnitThreatSituation(t) ~= nil then return UnitThreatSituation(t) else return 0 end end
-- Validator -- valid = nil function valid(t, spellid) if UnitExists(t) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) and UnitCanAttack("player", t) == 1 and UnitDebuffID("target", 33786) == nil and IsUsableSpell(GetSpellInfo(spellid)) == 1 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(spellid), t) == 1 then return true else return false end end
function testv() return "\124cFF15E615DarhangeR original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: Discord official chanel: https://discord.gg/zayx7p9" end PQR_WriteToChat(testv())
-- CastSpell -- function _castSpell(spellid,tar) if UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil --and IsPlayerSpell(spellid) == true and cdRemains(spellid) == 0 then if tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == nil then return false elseif tar ~= nil and rangeCheck(spellid,tar) == true then CastSpellByID(spellid, tar) return true elseif tar == nil then CastSpellByID(spellid) return true else return false end end end
-- Tabled Cast Time Checking for When you Last Cast Something. CheckCastTime = {} Nova_CheckLastCast = nil function Nova_CheckLastCast(spellid, ytime) -- SpellID of Spell To Check, How long of a gap are you looking for? if ytime > 0 then if #CheckCastTime > 0 then for i=1, #CheckCastTime do if CheckCastTime[i].SpellID == spellid then if GetTime() - CheckCastTime[i].CastTime > ytime then CheckCastTime[i].CastTime = GetTime() return true else return false end end end end table.insert(CheckCastTime, { SpellID = spellid, CastTime = GetTime() } ) return true elseif ytime <= 0 then return true end return false end
-- Cheking ForB -- function checkForbearance(unit) if UnitDebuffID(unit, 25771) == nil then return true else return false end end
functionsloaded = true end

Ability.Name: All:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: Use:Trinket (Heal)
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13)
if PQR_CustomTargetHP <= 15 and cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() and CanAttack() then UseInventoryItem(13, PQR_CustomTarget) return true end
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14)
if PQR_CustomTargetHP <= 15 and cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() and CanAttack() then UseInventoryItem(14, PQR_CustomTarget) return true end

Ability.Name: -- All:Racial --
Ability.Lua:
local debuff = { 6215, 8122, 5484, 2637, 5246, 6358 } local hracial = { 33697, 20572, 33702, 26297 } local alracial = { 20594, 28880, 59542 } local urace = {"Undead", "Worgen" } local hrace = { "Troll", "Orc" } local alrace = { "Dwarf", "Draenei", "Naga" } local myrace = UnitRace("player")
for i = 1, #debuff do if UnitDebuffID("player",debuff[i]) and tContains(urace, UnitRace("player")) and IsSpellKnown(7744) and not CooldownRemains(7744) and CanAttack() then CastSpellByID(7744) return true end end
if IsBoss() and CanAttack() and tContains(hrace, UnitRace("player")) then for i = 1, #hracial do if IsSpellKnown(hracial[i]) and not CooldownRemains(hracial[i]) then CastSpellByID(hracial[i]) return true end end end
if CanAttack() and getHp("player") <= 35 and tContains(alrace, UnitRace("player")) then for i = 1, #alracial do if IsSpellKnown(alracial[i]) and not CooldownRemains(alracial[i]) then CastSpellByID(alracial[i]) return true end end end

Ability.Name: All:Divine Shield
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 20 and not CooldownRemains(642) and checkForbearance("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Divine Protection
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") < 30 and not CooldownRemains(498) and checkForbearance("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Beacon of Light
Ability.Lua:
local BofL, _, _, _, _, _, timer = UnitBuffID("focus", 53563, "player") local focus = UnitExists("focus")
if focus ~= nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus") == nil and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(53563), "focus") == 1 then if BofL ~= nil then if timer - GetTime() < 10 then return true else return false end else return true end else return false end

Ability.Name: H:Sacred Shield
Ability.Lua:
local SSH, _, _, _, _, _, timer = UnitBuffID("focus", 53601, "player") local focus = UnitExists("focus")
if focus ~= nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus") == nil and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(53601), "focus") == 1 then if SSH ~= nil then if timer - GetTime() < 5 then return true else return false end else return true end else return false end

Ability.Name: H:Divine Plea
Ability.Lua: if getMana("player") <= 75 and lowhpmembers <= 2 and PQR_CustomTargetHP > 70 then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Divine Illumination
Ability.Lua: if (dplea ~= nil and awrath == nil) or lowhpmembers >= 5 or PQR_CustomTargetHP < 30 then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Hand of Sacrifice
Ability.Lua: if getHp("player") > 60 and PQR_CustomTargetHP < 30 then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Lay on Hands
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 15 and checkForbearance(PQR_CustomTarget) then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Holy Shock
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 60 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(48825) == false or pMove() then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Holy Light
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 90 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(48782) == false and pStay() then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Flash of Light
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 79 and ( IoL or AoW ) and pMove() then return true end

Ability.Name: H:Cleanse
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 47843, 65812, 68154, 68155, 68156, 70867, 29881, 70759, 30129 } local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 0, members, 1 do if i==0 then mem = "player" else mem = group..tostring(i) end if UnitInRange(mem) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(mem) == nil then local candispel = 1 for k,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(mem,v) then candispel = nil end end local j = 1 local debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,dur = UnitDebuff(mem, j) while debuff do if ((bufftype == "Magic") or (bufftype == "Disease") or (bufftype == "Poison")) and dur > 1 and candispel then CastSpellByID(4987,mem) return true end j = j + 1; debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(mem, j) end end end

Ability.Name: -- DarhangeR --
Ability.Lua: -- I'm the original developer of dat profiles. Any changes, copying or sharing without my knowledge direct copyright infringement. For more info: -- Discord official chanel: https://discord.gg/zayx7p9 -- VK: https://vk.com/darhanger -- FB: https://fb.com/darhanger -- Instagram: https://instagram.com/darhanger -- E-mail: civayan@gmail.com -- Dev Discord name: DarhangeR#6786

Ability.Name: -- Stats Buffs / Flask --
Ability.Lua:
-- Check Druids in party/raid -- local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
CheckDudu = nil function CheckDudu() for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local _, playerClass = UnitClass(member) if playerClass == "DRUID" and UnitIsFriend("player", member) then return true end end end -- BG Check -- function BG() if GetZoneText() == "Warsong Gulch" or GetZoneText() == "Warsong Flag Room" or GetZoneText() == "Silverwing Hold" or GetZoneText() == "Isle of Conquest" or GetZoneText() == "Arathi Basin" or GetZoneText() == "Alterac Valley" or GetZoneText() == "Eye of the Storm" or GetZoneText() == "Strand of the Ancients" or GetZoneText() == "Warsong Flag Room" or GetZoneText() == "Silverwing Hold" then return true else return false end end
-- BG Subzone Check -- function BGs() if GetSubZoneText() == "Warsong Flag Room" or GetSubZoneText() == "Silverwing Hold" then return true else return false end end
-- Arena Check -- function Arena () if GetZoneText() == "Ring of Valor" or GetZoneText() == "Ruins of Lordaeron" or GetZoneText() == "Ring of Trials" or GetZoneText() == "Circle of Blood" or GetZoneText() == "Dalaran Arena" or GetZoneText() == "Nagrand Arena" or GetZoneText() == "Blade's Edge Arena" then return true else return false end end
if NoKings == nil then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 26 then NoKings = true --else --NoKings = false end end end end
if not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") then
-- Drums of the WIld -- if not CheckDudu() and not UnitBuffID("player", 48470) and not UnitBuffID("player", 48469) and not UnitBuffID("player", 72588) and not Arena() then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 49634 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Voter Buff -- if not UnitBuffID("player", 35912) and not BG() and not BGs() and not Arena() and NoKings == true then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 26 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Donor Buff -- if not UnitBuffID("player", 35874) and not BG() and not BGs() and not Arena() then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 27 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Kings Buff / Drums -- if GetZoneText() ~= "Scarlet Monastery" and not UnitBuffID("player", 43223) and not UnitBuffID("player", 35912) and not UnitBuffID("player", 25898) and not Arena() or BG() and NoKings == nil then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 49633 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end end
DPS = nil function DPS() local _, playerClass = UnitClass("player")
if playerClass == "DEATHKNIGHT" or playerClass == "HUNTER" or playerClass == "WARRIOR" or playerClass == "PALADIN" or playerClass == "ROGUE" then return true end end
SpellDPS = nil function SpellDPS() local _, playerClass = UnitClass("player")
if playerClass == "WARLOCK" or playerClass == "SHAMAN" or playerClass == "MAGE" or playerClass == "DRUID" or playerClass == "PRIEST" then return true end end
-- Elixir of Empowerment / 30 Spell Pen -- if SpellDPS() and not UnitBuffID("player", 28514) and not Arena() then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 22848 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end
-- Lesser Flask of Resistance / 50 To All Resistance -- if DPS() and not UnitBuffID("player", 62380) and not Arena() then for b = 0, 4 do for s = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(b) do if GetContainerItemID(b, s) == 44939 then RunMacroText("/use "..b.." "..s) return true end end end end

Ability.Name: All:Seal of Righteousness
Ability.Lua: if not SoR and SOR() == true and AOE() == false then return true end

Ability.Name: R:Seal of Corruption/Vengeance
Ability.Lua:
if IsSpellKnown(53736) then if not (SoCr or SoV) and AOE() == false and SOR() == false then CastSpellByID(53736) return true end end
if IsSpellKnown(31801) then if not (SoV or SoCr) and AOE() == false and SOR() == false then CastSpellByID(31801) return true end end

Ability.Name: -- Paladin Stuff --
Ability.Lua: -- Paladin Stuff -- -- Dots / Debuffs -- HJoL = UnitDebuffID("target", 20185, "player") -- Procs -- AoW = UnitBuffID("player", 59578) IoL = UnitBuffID("player", 54149) -- Buffs -- votebuff = UnitBuffID("player",35912) GBoS = UnitBuffID("player",25899) rFury = UnitBuffID("player", 25780) dplea = UnitBuffID("player", 54428) dillum = UnitBuffID("player", 31842) awrath = UnitBuffID("player", 31884) hshield = UnitBuffID("player",48952) -- Seals -- SoR = UnitBuffID("player", 21084) SoL = UnitBuffID("player", 20165) SoJ = UnitBuffID("player", 20164) SoC = UnitBuffID("player", 20375) SoW = UnitBuffID("player", 20166) SoV = UnitBuffID("player", 31801) SoCr = UnitBuffID("player", 53736)

Ability.Name: H:Purify
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { } local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 0, members, 1 do if i==0 then mem = "player" else mem = group..tostring(i) end if UnitInRange(mem) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(mem) == nil then local candispel = 1 for k,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(mem,v) then candispel = nil end end local j = 1 local debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,dur = UnitDebuff(mem, j) while debuff do if ((bufftype == "Disease") or (bufftype == "Poison")) and dur > 1 and candispel then CastSpellByID(1152,mem) return true end j = j + 1; debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(mem, j) end end end

Ability.Name: All:GBoS
Ability.Lua: if votebuff and not GBoS and (GetSpellInfo(25899) or GetItemCount(21177) >= 1) then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Cancel RFury
Ability.Lua:
local p="player" for i=1,40
do local _,_,_,_,_,_,_,u,_,_,s=UnitBuff(p,i) if u==p and s==25780 then CancelUnitBuff(p,i) break end end

Ability.Name: H:Turn Evil
Ability.Lua:
local TU = UnitDebuffID("focus", 10326) local HW = UnitDebuffID("focus", 2812) local hasFocus = UnitExists("focus") local type = UnitCreatureType("focus") local Meta = UnitBuffID("focus", 59672)
if hasFocus ~= nil then if type == "Undead" or type == "Demon" or Meta ~= nil then if TU == nil and HW == nil then return true end end end

Ability.Name: -- Heal Engine --
Ability.Lua:
-- Simplest Heal Eng -- if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") and UnitHasVehicleUI("target") == false and UnitDebuffID("target", 69065) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target", 70157) == nil then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) ~= nil then memberhp = memberhp + 7 end if memberhp < 85 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < PQR_CustomTargetHP then PQR_CustomTarget = member PQR_CustomTargetHP = memberhp end end end end
-- Need this to stop casting to avoid stun -- local name, _, _, _, caststart, castend = UnitCastingInfo("target")
if UnitCastingInfo("target") ~= nil and UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Flame Jets" and castend - ( GetTime() * 1000 ) < .5 then SpellStopCasting() return true end
if view == nil then view = true local eventframe = CreateFrame("FRAME") print("\124cFFE61515DO NOT TARGET A FRIENDLY PLAYER!") print("\124cFFE61515НЕ ВЫБИРАТЬ В КАЧЕСТВИ ЦЕЛИ СОЮЗНИКА!") eventframe:RegisterEvent("EXECUTE_CHAT_LINE") end

Ability.Name: -- Heal Engine (Pet also) --
Ability.Lua:
-- Simplest Heal Eng -- if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") and UnitHasVehicleUI("target") == false and UnitDebuffID("target", 69065) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target", 70157) == nil then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0 lowhpmemberspets = 0
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) ~= nil then memberhp = memberhp + 7 end if memberhp < 85 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < PQR_CustomTargetHP then PQR_CustomTarget = member PQR_CustomTargetHP = memberhp end end end
if lowhpmembers == 0 then for i = 1, members, 1 do local memberpet = group..tostring"pet"..tostring(i) local memberpethp = 100 * UnitHealth(memberpet) / UnitHealthMax(memberpet) if UnitInRange(memberpet) and UnitIsFriend("player", memberpet) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(memberpet) == nil then if memberpethp < 85 then lowhpmemberspets = lowhpmemberspets +1 end PQR_CustomTarget = memberpet PQR_CustomTargetHP = memberpethp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end end end end
-- Need this to stop casting to avoid stun -- local name, _, _, _, caststart, castend = UnitCastingInfo("target")
if UnitCastingInfo("target") ~= nil and UnitCastingInfo("target") == "Flame Jets" and castend - ( GetTime() * 1000 ) < .5 then SpellStopCasting() return true end
if view == nil then view = true local eventframe = CreateFrame("FRAME") print("\124cFFE61515DO NOT TARGET A FRIENDLY PLAYER!") print("\124cFFE61515НЕ ВЫБИРАТЬ В КАЧЕСТВИ ЦЕЛИ СОЮЗНИКА!") eventframe:RegisterEvent("EXECUTE_CHAT_LINE") end

Ability.Name: -- All:Mouseover --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: Use:Trinket (Tank)
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() and getHp("player") <= 15 and CanAttack() then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and IsUsableTrink() and getHp("player") <= 15 and CanAttack() then UseInventoryItem(14) return true end

Ability.Name: H:Judgement of Light
Ability.Lua: if CanAttack() and rangeCheck(20271, "target") and not CooldownRemains(20271) and not HJoL then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Autotarget script --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and not UnitExists("target") and not SpellIsTargeting() then RunMacroText("/targetenemy") return true end

Ability.Name: -- All:Healthstone --
Ability.Lua:
local stones = { 36892, 36893, 36894 }
for i = 1, #stones do if getHp("player") <= 25 and GetItemCount(stones[i]) >= 1 and not ItemCooldownRemains(stones[i]) then UseItemByName(stones[i]) end end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells(H) --
Ability.Lua:
local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy" } local elite = { "Overlord Ror", "Ragepaw", "Liam", "Galleon", "Fire Giant", "Hogger", "Specimen 23" } local noaggromobs = nil local eliteboss = nil
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) then return true end
for i,v in ipairs(elite) do if UnitName("target") == v then eliteboss = 1 end end
IsBoss = nil function IsBoss() if UnitExists("target") and ( UnitLevel("target") == -1 or eliteboss ) then return true end end

Ability.Name: R:Judgement (PRO)
Ability.Lua: if CanAttack() and rangeCheck(20271, "target") and not CooldownRemains(20271) then if getMana("player") <= 15 and getHp("player") >= 70 then CastSpellByID(53408) end CastSpellByID(20271) return true end

Ability.Name: H:Cleanse (Self)
Ability.Lua:
local i = 1 local badCleanse = nil local goodCleanse = nil
local dontCleanse = { 47843, 65812, 68154, 68155, 68156, 70867, 29881, 70759, 30129 } for _,v in ipairs(dontCleanse) do if UnitDebuffID("player",v) then badCleanse = 1 end end
local buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff("player", i) while buff do if ((bufftype == "Magic") or (bufftype == "Disease") or (bufftype == "Poison")) and duration > 2 and count ~= 1 and not badCleanse then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff("player", i) end
